website_summaries.verdict: If you are looking for a good deal for the fast-approaching solar eclipse, you won't find a better value for your group.
pros: A convenient pack of 10 paper glasses that's ideal for groups and families
CE and ISO certified for safety
cons: Some reports of consumers receiving the wrong glasses

customer_reviews.title: TRUST ME. GO FOR IT. (But do your research first and outweight the risks)
customer_reviews.text: THEY ARE AS ADVERTISED. Honestly, I was a bit skeptical because of the negatives reviews and the fact that the eclipse date is so close, but the original (as advertised) by American Paper Optics in their website, arrived. Please, do not accept any scams or duplicates... it your health and your loved ones we are talking about. I will put in the picture that American Paper Optics has provided in their website for you guys to be able to compare it letter by letter to the original glasses.
customer_reviews.author: Jose Ricardo Martinez Vega

customer_reviews.title: Made by American Paper Optics as advertised
customer_reviews.text: I ordered from WorldPrime (and was Amazon prime eligible). All my glasses showed they were manufactured in the US by American Paper Optics and have the Nasa Approved ISO 12312-2. I tested them on a bright sunny day and I could see the sun with no eye strain. Everything else was blacked out as it should be. I'm very happy with my purchase. Since these are cardboard and I have kids who will be using them, I will be poking a small hole on each end and tying a thin elastic cord to each end. Then the glasses will wrap securely around my kids' heads to ensure they stay in place. I hope this idea helps other parents too.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: NASA approved
customer_reviews.text: i just ordered these august 1,2017 and made sure they fit the NASA requirements. the ones i got fit all the requirements NASA listed and were from american paper optics company, they are paper glasses not plastic. when you look through then you cannot see anything everything is black except you can see the sun so they work for us! im not sure why some peoples reviews said they received fake ones. i took the risk and was going to return them if they were fake but i had no issues. we will be using these for the eclipse this month.
customer_reviews.author: ajgb22

customer_reviews.title: As Described and on Time
customer_reviews.text: They came as described and the correct amount (10). They looked nice and they are the American Paper Optics product (the approved kind). They did come in two days as described-- granted we ordered them nearly six months after the eclipse in 2017. The only thing I didn't like was that they came in a massive box with air packaging around them (which was unexpected and I felt kind of excessive), but that did guarantee that they arrived undamaged.
customer_reviews.author: Josephine DiNovo

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied. Good Value - especially for a probable one ...
customer_reviews.text: AS advertised. Have the proper certification for safety when viewing the eclipse. It was less expensive to by this set of 10 than to purchase the same thing is lesser quantity and pay shipping and handling fees. These came with free Shipping. The arrived very quick after placing the order. Satisfied. Good Value - especially for a probable one time use.
customer_reviews.author: ampeyton

customer_reviews.title: Eclipse glasses worked great
customer_reviews.text: We got these for the 2017 eclipse. I was glad to get the American Paper Optics brand, because they were on the NASA approved list for vendors of eclipse glasses. There were imitations being sold that put people's eyesight at risk. I bought a 10-pack but there were only 3 in my viewing party so we gave them out to other families on the beach where we were viewing. They worked perfectly and I really enjoyed seeing the eclipse with these glasses.
customer_reviews.author: KMK Dancer

customer_reviews.title: The eyes have it!
customer_reviews.text: These Eclipse/Solar viewing glasses are the real deal. Researched several options for safe viewing of the August 21, 2017 Great American Eclipse, chose American Paper Optics' Eclipse/Solar viewing glasses for safety, design and price. The package of 10 glasses is the best value. I shared them with several friends and poor souls wandering around a parking lot in Lexington, KY.
customer_reviews.author: RICHARD Parrott

customer_reviews.title: Product arrived as advertised and has the correct ISO certification ...
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived as advertised and has the correct ISO certification stamped on the side. Amazon rejected the review that says which buyer I purchased it through on Amazon, so I cannot tell you that, despite many people asking. All I can say is that while some buyers have reported Chinese rip-offs, at least one of the sellers on Amazon is selling the legit product.
customer_reviews.author: M. Doyle

customer_reviews.title: coworkers and I were able to experience this one in a lifetime event thank you to this wonderful glasses and the amazing amazon customer service
customer_reviews.text: My family, coworkers and I were able to experience this one in a lifetime event thank you to this wonderful glasses and the amazing amazon customer service. After Having issues finding trustable sources for this glasses and all places been out of stock Amazon and American Paper Optics make this experience possible. We Thank You!
customer_reviews.author: Abrahan Soto

customer_reviews.title: ... because we will be in the path of the Great American Solar Eclipse in August
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this set of eclipse sunglasses because we will be in the path of the Great American Solar Eclipse in August. Tried them on a very sunny day and they worked just fine! There are enough for all my family in the pack and looking forward to viewing the eclipse safely!
customer_reviews.author: Goldenlover2

customer_reviews.title: These were over priced, And I believe it was ...
customer_reviews.text: These were over priced, And I believe it was only because as the eclipse drew nearer, the desperation set in, and willing to pay anything to replace the once we ordered PLENTY early enough, that Amazon Deemed unsafe to use. TOTAL RIP OFF! Yes, they did work for viewing the eclipse, but I had to pay 100 dollars, for cheap paper glasses- 10 pairs, because that was all that was available. And I only needed and used ONE. very unhappy.
customer_reviews.author: NewportKitty

customer_reviews.title: They're fine.
customer_reviews.text: I bought mine in June from this listing. They're the approved ones and work it seems. No problems there. I do think it's pretty dang low how they've jacked up the price. I bought them at 11.99 and free shipping. The price now is really outrageous.
customer_reviews.author: Anna's herding cats

customer_reviews.title: Safe and Effective!
customer_reviews.text: The solar eclipse was amazing and a once-in-a-lifetime experience. We were in the zone for the total eclipse, and using these glasses gave us the confidence to watch it without worrying about eye damage. I will never forget this experience, and I'm so glad I had the glasses so I could fully enjoy the experience!
customer_reviews.author: Martha Clardy

customer_reviews.title: They were horribly overpriced, but I'm sure I wouldn't have been ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought these really last minute (pretty sure mine were the last set). They got here on time, we didn't fry our eyes, and we got to see the coolest thing we've ever seen. They were horribly overpriced, but I'm sure I wouldn't have been able to buy them so late if they weren't.
customer_reviews.author: anon576

customer_reviews.title: Very Pleased with order!
customer_reviews.text: Woo hoo! Just received my CE certified glasses and YES, they do state they are ISO certified "meets the transmission requirements of ISO 12312-2 filters for direct observation of the sun." They are manufactured by American Paper Optics. I am Solar Eclipse ready in central Florida! Now, hoping the weather cooperates!
customer_reviews.author: Linda T.

customer_reviews.title: Great Eclipse Glasses
customer_reviews.text: Loved the glasses and worked perfectly for us to see the Great Solar Eclipse on August 21, 2017! I did read on the side of the glasses that the glasses should be thrown away after three years although I have no idea why, and maybe someone can answer that. I planned to save the extras for the next eclipse in 7 years.
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn G.

customer_reviews.title: Safe and stylish eye viewing eclipse protection
customer_reviews.text: The glasses arrived several days ahead of the advertised date. Great glasses to use to observe the eclipse. There was no eye discomfort after the eclipse finished its display. I would recommend these and would buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: Lou

customer_reviews.title: Literally made my day.
customer_reviews.text: Worked awesomely. I will never forget the eclipse it was a once in a lifetime experience. These were the real deal with the aluminum coating. You could not see a thing except for the sun and the eclipse. My eyes are still working just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Ian

customer_reviews.title: Filters Meet Requirement of ISO 12312-2
customer_reviews.text: I was scared because I saw many reviews for this product saying that they were made in China. That is the reason why I made sure to purchase them from the actual "American Paper Optic" sellers instead of others offering them for cheaper. Meets ISO 12312-2, Manufactered by American Paper Optic, Bartlett TN. Protect your eyes!! BUY SAFE, NOT CHEAP
customer_reviews.author: i.nav

customer_reviews.title: so happy to find these and get them within 24 hours
customer_reviews.text: so happy to find these and get them within 24 hours. I sold 9 pairs within hours after getting them! So we each paid what we should for one pair, we all just divided the cost evenly
customer_reviews.author: Marsha P

customer_reviews.title: These are the certified safe glasses, not the substandard knock-offs.
customer_reviews.text: These worked great for viewing the recent solar eclipse. I have several of the remaining pairs safely stored for viewing the next eclipse in several years time.
customer_reviews.author: -Pete

customer_reviews.title: Eclipse Glasses
customer_reviews.text: When you order the glasses make sure that your order will be through the company of American Paper Optics. Their glasses are made here in America and they are nasa approved glasses. I purchased mine and I have also tested the product. I stand with them.
customer_reviews.author: James A Kemmerlin

customer_reviews.title: Great, NASA approved eclipse glasses
customer_reviews.text: these worked great. way better than the various other techniques people around me where using. would buy again...if ever another eclipse come near
customer_reviews.author: bannondorf

customer_reviews.title: The real deal, nice quality!
customer_reviews.text: These work great but it was cloudy over here so we couldn't witness the eclipse 😞
customer_reviews.author: T.Wren

customer_reviews.title: Worked great. Not great for kids
customer_reviews.text: THis was our second order after we learned the first were a scam. These did the job well. Only issue is that I had 9 little kiddos all needing help keeping them on (too big). I spent most of the time finding ways to keep them on all of us.
customer_reviews.author: Bridgett

customer_reviews.title: Worked well
customer_reviews.text: They did not arrive on the date we were told (hence th four star rating) but did arrive prior to our needing them and were of the quality and specifications advertised. Worth the money!!!
customer_reviews.author: Ken Keith

customer_reviews.title: Worked fine.
customer_reviews.text: I gave all but one pair away to some very happy people. People with home made viewer were especially thrilled. Next eclipse is 2024. Go if you get the chance. Protect your eyes till total or you won't be able to see.
customer_reviews.author: BackStreet

customer_reviews.title: No eye damage for the neighborhood. We had a ...
customer_reviews.text: No eye damage for the neighborhood. We had a party for the street with only 1 share. Kids took to school for show and tell.
customer_reviews.author: Firsttime Buyer

customer_reviews.title: Eclipse Ready!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these to use at work. Perfect for the recent solar eclipse. Shipped quickly and we shared them so we could all experience this rare occurrence.
customer_reviews.author: JoAnna Williams

customer_reviews.title: CERTIFIED AND AUTHENTIC
customer_reviews.text: I received my glasses as described. They are APO manufactured (made in USA), meets the certification guidelines, and have the ISO seal. I'm glad I got them early. Now, waiting on the eclipse.
customer_reviews.author: RhonRhon

customer_reviews.title: Paid for 10; only had 6 in package
customer_reviews.text: Glasses look great, but I paid for the pack of 10 glasses, the sealed package said it had 10 glasses, but there were only 6 pair inside. Where are the other four glasses?
customer_reviews.author: Gramma Ann

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied Customer
customer_reviews.text: Saw the most awesome eclipse with these glasses. No problem...glass ISO certified made by a manf. NASA recommended to be safe. Delivered fast, and packaged well. AMAZON you have a customer for life. I highly recommend these glass for the next eclipse and AMAZON.
customer_reviews.author: Shirleen Stumberg

customer_reviews.title: The glasses turned out great and just in time for the big show
customer_reviews.text: The glasses turned out great and just in time for the big show. Could not have done without them. Thanks for the great service.
customer_reviews.author: Beverley A. Sibertson

customer_reviews.title: Works great for a tent groundcloth
customer_reviews.text: As advertised. Well made, waterproof, at least the first few times I've used this. Works great for a tent groundcloth, packs down small.
customer_reviews.author: Another reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the price and the shipping was reliable
customer_reviews.text: This is actually one of the brands approved by NASA. Great product for the price and the shipping was reliable. I got my glasses in plenty of time to see the eclipse.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: Great sun glasses, I bought for driving and it's very comfortable
customer_reviews.author: B. Yu

customer_reviews.title: ... of eclipse glasses early August 2017 and they are good! Granted they were a lot cheaper several weeks ...
customer_reviews.text: I received my order of eclipse glasses early August 2017 and they are good! Granted they were a lot cheaper several weeks ago! All the right letters and numbers are printed on the inside. They are also manufactured by a company on NASA's approved list. The only thing I can see through the lenses is the sun itself.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good pickup on a non-eclipse year. I like them, and more importantly, they work.
customer_reviews.author: Ron

customer_reviews.title: Top notch eclipse glasses
customer_reviews.text: The glasses worked well, were easy to wear and protected our eyes.
customer_reviews.author: D. M. Garland

customer_reviews.title: Great !
customer_reviews.text: Super fast shipping ! Can’t wait to use these ! Thank you very much !
customer_reviews.author: Shannon hennigan

customer_reviews.title: Mine seem good
customer_reviews.text: I ordered mine in July. They look like the good ones. It's strange that people are getting different kinds from this same link.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia V

customer_reviews.title: Glasses for the NY partial eclipse.
customer_reviews.text: Seemed expensive but fun to have had for our large group. They are only good for 3 years and the next eclipse is in 7.
customer_reviews.author: JBB

customer_reviews.title: Hits the spot
customer_reviews.text: Students loved these! Really dark (just like they should be) until looking at the sun and then perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald Joseph

customer_reviews.title: Eclipse glasses were great
customer_reviews.text: These were great and made enjoying the eclipse safe and worry free. I even had extras to share with my friends.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Lee Lence

customer_reviews.title: Certified and perfect
customer_reviews.text: They worked perfectly! They were one of the brands recommended by NASA.
customer_reviews.author: MH

customer_reviews.title: OK, ready for the next eclipse
customer_reviews.text: Well, they must have worked because we can all still see
customer_reviews.author: PEP

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent glasses for viewing the solar eclipse. Able to comfortably look at the sun.
customer_reviews.author: lv2shop

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: These are the correct glasses with the correct stamps and saying they were made by American Optics.

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied.
customer_reviews.text: Glasses arrived on time with all the credible markings. Very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Geozim

customer_reviews.title: Worked great.
customer_reviews.text: Pricey, but we were happy to have them to view solar eclipse.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I bought eclipse glasses from 123sales, and they were ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought eclipse glasses from 123sales, and they were legitimate ISO certified products made in the United States. My visual test showed that only an orange circle of the sun could be seen.
customer_reviews.author: BH

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are the real deal...ordered Thursday evening, received Saturday morning....thanking my lucky stars!!! Come on eclipse!!
customer_reviews.author: Boogie Man

customer_reviews.title: Worked great but was gouged on the price.
customer_reviews.text: Worked perfect for us to enjoy this awe inspiring event. I'm very disappointed on the price gouging.
customer_reviews.author: CMast

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I returned this set, as I received a previous order. But they were as advertised
customer_reviews.author: Linda Yesilonis

customer_reviews.title: worked great.
customer_reviews.text: These worked fine for the August 2017 eclipse. Clear view and I can still see today.
customer_reviews.author: Bvus

customer_reviews.title: I brought these in to work and shared with coworkers ...
customer_reviews.text: I brought these in to work and shared with coworkers and our clients. We all got to see the eclipse!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Stuff
customer_reviews.text: Got my Eclipse Glasses today and they look like the good stuff not the China garbage
customer_reviews.author: Jstew

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Certified safe eclipse viewing glasses. Felt safe to send my grandchildren! Timely delivery!!!
customer_reviews.author: Leslie Baker

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Worked very well - Just as I expected Will save for 2024
customer_reviews.author: A Metro

customer_reviews.title: Great value for legit product.
customer_reviews.text: These are the legit kind. Verified on NASA website with link to APO site that shows the difference between real and fake. We got a great price of $16.99 for the 10 pack on July 30, 2017
customer_reviews.author: A Reader

customer_reviews.title: Easy to purchase and at a very reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: Easy to purchase and at a very reasonable price. Arrived in plenty of time and worked perfectly to watch this wonder.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew P Connolly

customer_reviews.title: Perfect eye protection for watching eclipse
customer_reviews.text: They were great for watching the eclipse No worry about eye damage with these glasses

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: The product was cheep, overpriced and some were not functional when they arrived.
customer_reviews.author: Clinton Higginbotham

customer_reviews.title: Sun spot watching
customer_reviews.text: Simple and easy Used for class to view sun spots
customer_reviews.author: Barbara E. Rios

customer_reviews.title: So many uses
customer_reviews.text: Where do I start? Not only can you look at the sun, you can put them on at work and nobody knows you're sleeping. Also comes in handy when getting intimate with over sized ladies.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Tried one outside and worked great looking at the sun.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel R. Fausnaugh

customer_reviews.title: Worked great. Could have been a little more sturdy but ...
customer_reviews.text: Worked great. Could have been a little more sturdy but we enjoyed the show!
customer_reviews.author: retiree

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: The cardboard light-blocking area could have been larger for better safety. Otherwise, the "glasses" were quite satisfactory.
customer_reviews.author: Larry B Phillips

customer_reviews.title: This is the second time I’ve ordered these eclipse glasses ...
customer_reviews.text: This is the second time I’ve ordered these eclipse glasses and both times they have arrived damaged. Whoever is packing them is folding them across one of the lenses. This is not acceptable! I am once again returning them !
customer_reviews.author: Katherine C.

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Worked as advertised, provided an excellent and safe, view of the eclipse.
customer_reviews.author: MJ

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It was amazing to be able to watch the solar eclipse on 8-21-17 with these glasses.
customer_reviews.author: Gay Nechvatal

customer_reviews.title: Priced what the market would bear.
customer_reviews.text: $13.99 when I first looked, $39.99 when I bought, $89.99 at one point. Useless now. Still, very glad I had them. Performance was tops.
customer_reviews.author: Rita Aldridge

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: performed as advertised, arrived in plenty of time to be used. 100% of what could be asked
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These arrived in a very timely manner and performed as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Eclipse glasses right on !!!!!
customer_reviews.text: The glasses were the correct ones for viewing and brought great enjoyment for all of us.
customer_reviews.author: ne6cpmPhil Turner

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works exactly as intended. No issues with any of the glasses.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Jorvina

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent glasses for the eclipse/solar viewing. Enough for the family & friends to view the eclipse worked well.
customer_reviews.author: D C

customer_reviews.title: perfect darkness
customer_reviews.text: they arrived in perfect condition, were very colorful, and most importantly worked extremely well. Can't wait for the 2024 eclipse so I can purchase them again
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Pricey but met NASA and ISO recommendations for eye safety.
customer_reviews.author: Edwin T. Schober

customer_reviews.title: Good glasses, but ...
customer_reviews.text: Mine show the ISO number and all the correct things on them. I just got them yesterday - The Random pack of 10. Now I see they are selling them for $99! Come on! I almost gave a star down just for that! These are $1 a pair glasses, and you are selling them for $10 each now! Shame on you, for people who want to get these for their kids, or teachers who have to buy them for their students. But otherwise the glasses are exactly as described.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Clark

customer_reviews.title: Not as advertised
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the 10 pack of glasses. Just opened and there were only 7. Don't have time to return. 😟
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They arrived 1 hour after the eclipse. I did ...
customer_reviews.text: They arrived 1 hour after the eclipse.I did however get my money back, and was able to share a pair of glasses to watch the eclipse,so all is well.
customer_reviews.author: Collin Bangs

customer_reviews.title: A good time was had by all
customer_reviews.text: All ten pairs worked perfectly. A good time was had by all.
customer_reviews.author: Xplorit

customer_reviews.title: Only got 9 pair
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the 10 pack and only received 9 pair. For the price I should have gotten all 10. Disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole skubic

customer_reviews.title: Late & Fake Eclipse Glasses
customer_reviews.text: The glasses arrived 2 hours after the eclipse was concluded and the glasses were fake.
customer_reviews.author: Margie

customer_reviews.title: Huge waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Huge waste of money. Super cheap cardboard glasses with foil lenses. I could have bought these anywhere around town for $1. Tried to cancel within an hour of placing it but was not allowed to. Lesson learned.
customer_reviews.author: Redman62

customer_reviews.title: One of the 5 brands approved by NASA fro eclipse glasses!
customer_reviews.text: I haven't used this during an eclipse yet (obviously), but they are super dark and seem to offer eye protection when looking at the sun.
customer_reviews.author: KED

customer_reviews.title: Sloppy shipping.
customer_reviews.text: I'm sure the lenses work but the lazy shipping was all it took to leave a bad first impression.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I am very disappointed they were supposed to made in America
customer_reviews.text: Part of the glasses did not have the number 12312-2 some of them of them said made in China. so We will not have enough glasses for all of us on sept.21st.I am very disappointed they were supposed to made in America I ordered 20 pair of glasses . Lillie Harmon Eclipse paper Glasses
customer_reviews.author: Lillie Harmon

product_meta.title: Eclipse/Solar Viewing Glasses – ISO & CE Certified for Safe Solar Viewing– 10pk Assorted- Eye Protection
product_meta.description: Due to high demand of eclipse glasses the number of styles may vary from 3-5 and may include a plain white style to make up the 10pk.
feature_bullets: SAFETY FIRST! These Glasses are both ISO and CE certified for safe viewing. Never look at the sun without special eye protection
STYLES MAY VARY, but safety will not! American Paper Optics glasses are all safe for Eclipse/Solar viewing. Read all safety instructions printed on the back of each pair of glasses

AMERICAN PAPER OPTICS is your safest and best bet when it comes to purchasing the right set of eclipse/sun viewing glasses. These glasses provide Eye Protection so that no harmful rays can reach the eye
MAKES A GREAT KEEPSAKE- the perfect Souvenir from the 2017 Eclipse
ENJOY! Whether you are collecting them or need them for future Solar Viewing, American Paper Optics makes the very best!
